elements.name: Issuing a reloadable card on already linked mobile for V1 API

steps.name: i am an authorized corporate user
i am issuing an Instant Reloadable Digital Card using "old" header with V1 of API
i am again issuing the the card with the same details with "old" for V1 API
the status code should be 200
i should see the following in the header level
i should see the following in the card list

cells: Request declined. Only one such card can be linked to a mobile number
